P

peek() - Static method in class ss.utils.TextIO
Returns the next character in the current input source, without actually removing that character from the input.

this class has a main method that we can use to test out and play the game

pingClient() - Method in class Network.Client
a method that sends to the server through the set ClientHandler a ping command to check if the connection is still running
pingServer() - Method in class Network.ClientHandler
a ping method that sends back ping to check if the client is still alvie (connected to the server)

method places down the mark on the field and rotates a sub board

Player - Class in GameLogic

pos(int, int) - Method in class GameLogic.Board

printResult() - Method in class GameLogic.Game

put(Object) - Static method in class ss.utils.TextIO
Write a single value to the current output destination, using the default format and no extra spaces.
put(Object, int) - Static method in class ss.utils.TextIO
Write a single value to the current output destination, using the default format and outputting at least minChars characters (with extra spaces added before the output value if necessary).
putf(String, Object...) - Static method in class ss.utils.TextIO
Writes formatted output values to the current output destination.
putln() - Static method in class ss.utils.TextIO
Write an end-of-line character to the current output destination.
putln(Object) - Static method in class ss.utils.TextIO
This is equivalent to put(x), followed by an end-of-line.
putln(Object, int) - Static method in class ss.utils.TextIO
This is equivalent to put(x,minChars), followed by an end-of-line.
